briefdescription.para: Handler function which may be called to log an incoming frame onto zigbee endpoint.

detaileddescription.para: When this function is called as a callback bound to endpoint via ZB_AF_SET_ENDPOINT_HANDLER(), (directly or indirectly) it produces a log line similar to the following: ReceivedZCLcommand(17):src_addr=0x0000(short)src_ep=64dst_ep=64 cluster_id=0x0000profile_id=0x0104rssi=0cmd_dir=0common_cmd=1cmd_id=0x00 cmd_seq=128disable_def_resp=0manuf_code=voidpayload=[0700](17)

parameterdescription.para: Reference to zigbee buffer holding received zcl command to be logged
in all conditions. This enables possibility to use this function directly as zigbee stack endpoint handler.

briefdescription.para: Library for logging incoming ZCL packets.

detaileddescription.para: Provides Zigbee endpoint handler for parsing incoming ZCL packets and logging packet's fields and payload.
